Module info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev
Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.crawler

Class WebCrawler

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.dunaev.crawler.WebCrawler
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdvancedCrawler, Crawler, NewCrawler, AutoCloseable
public class WebCrawler extends Object implements AdvancedCrawler
Class to crawl websites. Provides list of downloaded sites, and all errors if ones. Has graceful shutdown close and CLI.
Author:
Dunaev Kirill

  • Constructor Details

    • WebCrawler

      public WebCrawler(Downloader downloader, int downloaders, int extractors, int perHost)
      Creates crawler with specified settings.
      Parameters:
      downloader - downloader of websites
      downloaders - maximum number of pages downloading in parallel
      extractors - maximum number of pages extracting links in parallel from which
      perHost - maximum number of pages downloading in parallel from the same host
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if non-positive limitations are provided
      NullPointerException - if downloader is null

    • download

      public Result download(String url, int depth, Set<String> excludes)
      Downloads website up to specified depth.
      Specified by:
      download in interface NewCrawler
      Parameters:
      url - start URL.
      depth - download depth.
      excludes - URLs containing one of given substrings are ignored.
      Returns:
      download result.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if depth <1

    • advancedDownload

      public Result advancedDownload(String url, int depth, List<String> hosts)
      Downloads website up to specified depth.
      Specified by:
      advancedDownload in interface AdvancedCrawler
      Parameters:
      url - start URL.
      depth - download depth.
      hosts - domains to follow, pages on another domains should be ignored.
      Returns:
      download result.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if depth <1

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      CLI for the crawler. Crawls the website and prints downloaded sites and errors. Usage: 
      WebCrawler url [depth [downloads [extractors [perHost]]]]
      Default values are 1 for depth and 100 for other arguments.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments
